job_description:
• Educational background in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Physics, or a related technical field.
• Strong communication skills, including the ability to present bold concepts and incorporate feedback effectively.
• Strong understanding of engineering fundamentals (e.
• , mathematics, materials science, mechanical/electrical principles).
• Full-stack R&D capabilities, including:Interpreting academic research and patents.
• Modeling systems using simulation or software tools.
• Prototyping with machining, rapid fabrication, and embedded systems.
• Designing and running experiments with structured analysis of results.
